name: Meta SEO BenignSource
author: BenignSource

sections.description:
What gives you the Meta SEO BenignSource ?

Custom Title different from basic Title

Custom Meta Description

Custom Meta Keywords

Meta Open Graph Protocol

Google Stopwords Checker

Alexa Optimizing Rating

Google Search by Title

Insert Author

Insert Publisher

Fully 100% Responsive

24/7 Support & Help

Without spam and ads in your HTML code!

Feedback, Questions, Help, Bug Reporting, and Suggestions

Just email us at: support@benignsource.com / Email Subject : Meta SEO BenignSource
sections.installation:
1. Copy Meta SEO BenignSource in your plugin directory
  2. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  3. Activate the Meta SEO BenignSource plugin and a subpage for the plugin will appear in your Manage menu.
  4. Go to the Settings > Meta SEO BenignSource and make the settings step by step
  5. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
